3338.name: Law prohibits or invalidates child or early marriage (1=yes; 0=no)
3338.description: Law prohibits or invalidates child or early marriage is whether there are provisions that prevent the marriage of girls, boys, or both before they reach the legal age of marriage or the age of marriage with consent, including, for example, a prohibition on registering the marriage or provisions stating that such a marriage is null and void.
3338.s_name: World Bank – WDI: Law prohibits or invalidates child or early marriage (1=yes; 0=no)

source.name: World Bank – WDI: Law prohibits or invalidates child or early marriage (1=yes; 0=no)
source.dataPublisherSource: World Bank: Women, Business and the Law.
